title: Bug on version 9.2
text: Dear telegram team, every latest version which is released is better than the previous one. But at this version released recently (9.2) there is a bug: telegram app shoots me out by itself for several times and it repeatedly happens. It‚Äôs not only about me because I see exactly the same issue on other iPhones with the latest telegram and iOS versions. Will be glad if you do something about it. Thank you.

title: Needs a lot of accessibility improvement
text: Telegram is not fully accessible with VoiceOver, the iOS ScreenReader used by people who are blind or visually impaired. Many people have reported the problem to Telegram to no avail. I will revisit this evaluation and change my rating if I see serious accessibility improvements in future releases. Currently it is impossible for a person who is blind or visually impaired to effectively control the settings of his/her group or channel without seeking sighted help, which defeats the purpose of having ones group or channel.

title: Super useful and fast messaging app
text:
The group and channels functionality is far superior than any other chatting apps. We do miss some video calling but am sure it will be added eventually. 
I‚Äôve been using the app for a while now and seen it get better with every update. 
Still annoys me the ‚Äúcontact has joined telegram‚Äù thingy but that‚Äôs ok. 
I keep coming back from other forks like Nicegram because this one is way more fluid and responsive.

title: Love the app, not the new update AT ALL
text: I‚Äôm a really long time telegram user. If I had downloaded the app for the first time right now, I wouldn‚Äôt have given it a 5 stars rating because of the new ‚Äúprivacy‚Äù update. I love this app. It‚Äôs literally the BEST messaging app out there, but this new update is basically ruining the greatness of it. I highly suggest you take these new features back. Especially the new ‚Äúboth-end message removal‚Äù ability. Keep up the great work

title: Love this app!
text: I‚Äôve used this app for a little over 2 years now and I love it! Stickers are fun when in conversations with groups of friends or just one person! I‚Äôm an admin for a few chats and it‚Äôs easy to fun group chats in this app with large amount of users. I don‚Äôt even use my messenger app on my iPhone unless messaging my family. The customization of the background is nice add as well. This app is everything I wanted and more and worth downloading.

title: Too much nudity
text: You can be trying to talk to your friends or family members, then you get this text from someone fully nude. Once that happens, you get more and more nude photos sent to you. Every time they‚Äôre trying to scam you of money by saying do you want my service and where do you live you say oh I live close to you let‚Äôs meet up for $200 card. Once you do that they don‚Äôt respond or ever show up, so they just need to put something on here where you can report people for sending nudes. So if you don‚Äôt want nude photos and scammers annoying you the whole day download it if not don‚Äôt download it.

title: Need better sort/filter options
text: I enjoy chatting with large groups within this app but when multiple people are sharing info/media it can get hard to find the info you are looking for easily. Can you add sort/filter or labeling options for the media and file tabs? It would be nice to be able to create more than one media tab and be able to label those various tab options within a group. Fix that and you get 5 stars easily!

title: Suggestion
text: Facebook is only used for touching w far away family and marketplace. Otherwise, they have faded away. Telegram is where it‚Äôs at! But would like to see a search incorporated when adding groups to chat folders. As many groups that I joined‚Ä¶ lol‚Ä¶ I need help finding a group to add to chat folder quickly. As of right now, I‚Äôm scrolling and scrolling. ü§£ Cannot say enough how great telegram is!

title: Perfect Family Messaging App
text: Without a doubt a fantastic, easy and secure way to share tender family moments caught on video! The functionally of this app is remarkable. The voice message option is great. Recording compressed video and taking pictures within the app is awesome and easy to use. Highly recommend for your close knit family that you want you share fun or tender moments with but you wouldn't necessarily want to post it on social media.

title: You get scammed on here
text: I got a text on Facebook Messenger from the company Lionsbridge. They told me to download this app to start the application. Mind you this is a really company. However, they needed my login to Facebook and I asked many questions before doing so. And I felt comfortable with it because they seemed legit and answered all my questions. But then they told me to send them 300$ which absolutely not. And then when I went back on my Facebook they changed my email, phone number and password all while telling me I would have full access to my account while they recruited other people to work for them.

title: Love the app!
text: Theres a few small features and things I would like to see done which I will add later because they slipped my mind but honestly this is the best app ever. I wish the polls bot worked a bit better and that the bots in chat are integrated in a little bit easier. Also a simplified bot response saying "1vote for--" instead of the whole message it sends out.

title: Telegram is life
text: I live telegram. It stores your contacts, Its fast , secure, simple, and they keep on adding new features. I‚Äôm a ux designer by trade so I know how hard it is to make a product people adore. And I loovvee this. Everyone around me is on it. It has screen sharing now, video calls, you name it. There‚Äôs nothing I wouldn‚Äôt do to buy this even if it was not free. Love telegram. Telegram saves time and sometimes even your life.

title: Simple, Fast, Intuitive. Quickly became my new social media application.
text: I‚Äôve been looking for a way to share information to a large number of people all at once, and it is so easy with this app, I wish I discovered it sooner. Plus, it feels good to not have to worry about how my data may be used or be stolen, and the freedom this app gives me to customize and create is unlike any other application I‚Äôve used. Excellent!!

Hello developer! Telegram has more than 20 million users in China! This is a very large group! However, it has been several years since the launch of telegram, but as a developer, he has been slow to add Chinese to the software! I would like to ask you that you have supported the languages of nearly 20 countries! When can we launch simplified Chinese! Love you!

title: Love it
text:
Telegram is awesome and I love it. It‚Äôs working a lot better then my other encrypted messaging apps at the moment which all have been attacked in some form including telegram but I still enjoy it better. I can‚Äôt wait to see what‚Äôs next.  
A huge complaint I have is why all the user comments are not peers from my country and that‚Äôs been the case in almost every other app I‚Äôve been using for the past 4.5 years and my security has only gotten worse when my knowledge of what apps are good encryption apps to use to avoid tracking has grown a lot since I‚Äôve been trying everything I could think of to try and shake whom ever thinks I‚Äôm worth all the trouble.

title: so far...
text:
too bad apple has tried and been able to bully telegram into selective censorship and strange bugs...

this has been the most responsible messaging company to make it big. it is also the easiest to use of the actually secure messengers. all chats are encrypted, but the servers are run by brothers who must stay idealistic to resist government corruption. it has optional E2E chat mode that does not upload messages to servers and can be deleted for good like Wickr. but E2E will OF COURSE limit you to basic messengering without server help to add interactive features. you can‚Äôt make better than that unless you can be like the wealthy brothers who run Telegram

title: Needs more features like..
text:
Thanks for all the features but there are multiple things i would love to see in this app including:

1. An eyedropper in the editing part is really needed.

2. There‚Äôs a ‚Äúpin to top‚Äù feature which is amazing. but have you ever thought of a ‚Äúpin to bottom‚Äù thing?
sometimes there are secret chats or groups we don‚Äôt want to see but we cannot delete or leave them at the same time. it would be great if we could pin the to the bottom of our chats.

3. For making video calls I have to use other applications which is annoying. telegram needs to have this feature.

4. If we could just star or label some texts or medias in chats, groups and even in the saved messages, we could save important things which is easily accessible too.

Thanks for your consideration!

title: This thing should be in reversed manner
text: When you want to delete message, you have by default delete only by your side, and option check box to delete it from the other side also. I think it should be reversed. I.e. by default you can delete from other side (in private chat or group, delete for all) and check box to choose to delete only for you. I think that would be more practical. Hope you‚Äôll pay attention to that.

title: The Best App Period!
text: Has everything you need. Super fast. Calls, messaging, can download media. I barely use any other messaging app anymore. It has all your data stored so even if you loose your phone you can get back everything from their cloud, pictures videos, contacts. I love telegram! I‚Äôve never revived any app but I had to tell the world to download and use this and support them. Thank you to whoever created this.

title: Music list doesn‚Äôt go down
text:
Hi
I‚Äôve updated my telegram to the last version and when I play a song and then tap it and the playlist comes up, it doesn‚Äôt go back. Ain‚Äôt nothing I can do to return to the chat but exiting and closing the app which obviously stops the song.
The only thing I can do is not to tap on song to see the playlist that comes up after it.
I‚Äôll be happy if it could be fixed.
Thanks

title: So far the best messenger app I have used!
text: This app is amazing, even that there is no perfect app, but this one is close to it. Great support on updates, awesominator emoji‚Äôs animations, a huge sticker library, only messenger that can send up to 2GB size files (4GB with premium version) hopefully it keeps improving on video and audio calls. And wish for the ü¶Ü and üê¢ emojis to get animated as well soon. Thank you Telegram for such an awesominator app!

title: Love it! One suggestion‚Ä¶
text:
Love the new feature of read receipts in group chats.  However it would be so helpful if it also showed who HASN‚ÄôT read yet‚Ä¶ because usually those are the ones that require a follow up. 

In general I love telegram. I wish more people switched to it from WhatsApp. Sooo many more features that make it fun and productive. The polling is super duper convenient to cut noise on big group chats.

title: Love Telegram BUT Please Fix Apple Carplay
text:
Your latest update may have broken Carplay enabled use and that's a big no-no. It worked flawless before your update and I've seen no release by devs on this or if they're going to say it's an iOS update,which I doubt since my wife's iPhone is updated and not on the Beta program BUT mine is and BOTH are broke. Please fix this Csrolay issue devs, we'd apparently it!

Still 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è application regardless....

title: Telegram app
text: This application is one of the best applications in the world with the best settings and the best personalization in the application.  Everyone in the world uses it and loves it.  I enjoy working with this app and I don't get bored. This app is very easy and easy for everyone to work with. efinitely  will be one of the best applications because of the way it is made, because the human grandson can use it. Old and young, literate or illiterate, etc. It's just a pity that they boycotted it in Iran.

title: AMAZING APP!
text:
I have introduced over 30people to this app since I have had it, since the past years. You know what I like about the app is it‚Äôs uniqueness. 

Please do not add a video to it, it has to be different from all other apps. If you have an iPhone you could use FACETIME. This app is amazing for it‚Äôs uniqueness. Everyone has a WhatsApp for video call. This app is for a private life. 

Sometimes it‚Äôs good to just talk on the phone without being on a video, it‚Äôs no longer going to be different if a video feature is added to it. People don‚Äôt have to call on video without them asking your permission. 

I will stop using the day a video feature is added to it, and I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôll convince everyone I introduced to the app to have it deleted üòê

I LOVE THIS APP!!!!!!!! It‚Äôs PERFECT!!!! ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Notifications still buggy and don‚Äôt work!
text: How can this app continuously have the same bugs each update, and never get fixed. I report it through your website, through apple feedback assistant, and still my notifications don‚Äôt work. I wipe my phone so its fresh and still issues. This needs to get fixed and stay fixed. I depend heavily on my communication on this app and when I don‚Äôt get a response bc a failed notifications it leaves me out of touch of ppl who need me to care for them! Please step up and fix this.

title: Recommendation on searching
text:
First and foremost, I really like this app. I am just writing this review because I faced with this situation many times.
When I am searchin an specific word it could be really easier if I have this option to choose search on what group. For example search on my private chats, channels or groups. In this way I can find what I want so quick.

Thank you in advance for you consideration and your great app!

title: Status Functionality
text: Well I really prefer Telegram for chatting because I‚Äôm 100% sure that I‚Äôm in control of my data, I would recommend this app to my friends that‚Äôs for sure. But there‚Äôs one thing I would like to add, if you guys could add the status view functionality ( just like WhatsApp ) on Telegram I think that would make people much more interested in the app, Thanks!

title: Racism Headquarters
text:
If you‚Äôre a racist, Hitler loving Nazi, then this is the app for you. There are no rules. You can chat about killing millions of people and the extermination of numerous races and religious groups. You can share all your white pride posts. Post videos of violence against minorities. It‚Äôs got it all.

Seriously, this is the most vile social media platform I have seen since 4chan. Telegram does not care about the safety of minorities or basically anyone who is not white and Christian. The type of channels on this app, which can easily be found, deserve no place in our society and as far as I am concerned, Telegram is actively promoting hate and violence towards other communities. You should be ashamed of yourselves.

title: Persistent Bug in Telegram Updates
text: Telegram is my favorite mobile messenger and I generally have no problems using it, but since the new layout update I've not been able to open app-specific links like Twitter, it defaults to opening them in Safari. Back when Telegram X was introduced, I had this exact same problem, which is why I stopped using it and returned to the normal app. Please fix this bug, or at least add an option to associate link domains with certain apps.

title: The most perfect app ever!
text: The best messenger for good. I haven‚Äôt experienced any bugs or any other problems, but unfortunately we have to use a VPN when we want to message someone in telegram. That may sometimes cause lagging and stuff, which we know it‚Äôs due to the function of VPNs. Anyway, I hope other users can upload stories soon and I can‚Äôt wait to try it!

title: Great app but becoming unusable
text:
Unfortunately there is an issue with telegram storing "hidden" files in my Iphone.
The application stores Gb's of data in my phone, even with me having all te app's settings regarding memory and data on the lowest possible setting. 

I do have lots of groups and that is probably the reason for that but it really has to be fixed asap because:

1) Telegram crams up almost all of my memory on Iphone by storing indefinite amount of Gb's in a matter of days.

2) The files stored are acting as hidden and can not be accessed nor by phone or by connecting the phone to a mac or pc using a file manager applications designated for iphone.

The only solution I've found to this is to delete Telegram every few days which is a huge hassle as my phone's memory cannot be expanded from the factory setting.

title: Creating chats with new contacts üôÑ
text: I enjoy telegram. My only issue is every time one of my phone contacts joins a new chat is automatically created with that person. I find this to be such an odd feature as I don‚Äôt have open blank texts with everyone in my phone... so why would I want that with anyone I know that joins Telegram? I don‚Äôt have a problem deleting the chats I just think this is an odd feature that I would super appreciate the Telegram developers adjust. Thank you for making a safe open platform!

title: Most secure and pure messaging app
text: I‚Äôve tried many messaging apps and Telegram is my favorite by far. No more spam and advertising to deal with, it‚Äôs fast, not data intensive (uses less mobile data than any others I‚Äôve used) and the most secure.  Finally the emoji content is the best by far.  Thanks to the developers for their hard work in maintaining & improving while sticking to the app‚Äôs original intent; to be fast and secure.

title: User beware
text: Lots of coders or hackers. They love this messenger because of privacy. Don‚Äôt allow any pics/vids to download. You will get hacked. Never allow anyone to view your telephone # ( banking 2nd step verification). I looked in my setting. Had 3 open sessions? Should of been one. Telegram bans you if someone complains. I Started a group, lost everything because of a a-hole. But In settings, you can block, boot anyone, or leave group. Enter at your own risk.

title: Amazing but I need one more thing!!!
text:
It‚Äôs wonderful and keeps growing but one important thing that I was thinking about and I guess that telegram actually does have this feature and that‚Äôs it : keep files in storage for specific time separately from each other. For example keep media for just 3 days but musics forever (because telegram is now my daily music player app too üòâ) 
Thanks for being so cool so far!!! üòö

title: Add important feature
text: I like the feature of the ability of making folder for each chats and recently the ( topics feature ) for groups, BUT i have one more wish. If you add (topics) in the (file segment) of ( channel ) this will be a very useful, helpful and great feature of all time. Every things will be organized and as student this will help me alot. I think if this become reality, the app will be much better.

title: Accessibility features do not work.
text: When I first started using Telegram, everything was great. I am a visually impaired, user and use the push to speak option. This is the feature where the user presses and holds on one of the text bubbles, a dialog box opens with options to share, etc. One of the options is to speak the text aloud. This feature used to work, but now, for some reason does not. I‚Äôve tried to restart the app and the phone. And most importantly, I messaged the company itself about this problem. No response.

title: Great App
text:
I prefer this app. Its the best chat app IMO. I wish everything was encrypted. Its best to have messages auto delete after a specified period time. 

I see this update shows mystory and chat icons at the top. I doubt I will ever use mystory but it eould be much better if you could change between chats and groups in such a manner. My biggest complaint is that chats and groups are mixed together.

title: What are you guys doing?
text: I‚Äôve been using this app for almost a decade on my iPhone 6 and love it but since the last couple of weeks it‚Äôs just becoming unusable! First I tried to use a video for my profile photo I have been doing it for many years but when I did it the app just crashed I tried many things the app just crashes. So I gave up. So now I updated to the latest version not only I can‚Äôt do that, but also the app just crashes when I go into it! Literally just seconds after I open it it will crashes. Telegram was best but you guys are ruining it with you own hands!

title: The best.
text:
It's the best honestly 
But there is something I don't know how you didn't fix until now
Live locations don't update if you close telegram you have to keep it up in order to update your location
I've been seeing some methods shared on the web on how to keep itcupdated even if you close but these can't be trusted and I'm waiting for you to fix it

title: Good riddance.
text: I‚Äôm in a long distance relationship and we both depend on telegram calls and video calls, I kid you not we used to have a 16 or 18 hour long calls, idk when exactly maybe 4 or 6 months ago this app literally went downhill, the app would force closes, our calls would abruptly end in seconds we can‚Äôt even have 2 or 3 full hours, heck we can‚Äôt even have a full minute sometimes! We‚Äôve always had a special place for telegram in our hearts because we started talking there in the beginning of our relationship, but it‚Äôs definitely time to move on. Signal perhaps?

title: Constant crashing for over 2 weeks
text: I have used and enjoyed telegram for quite some time. Then a few weeks ago, I couldn‚Äôt click on any messages. If I do, the app crashes. I thought it was bc my phone storage was low so I deleted several GB of junk and restarted my phone, cleared all my windows and even updated my phone. Nothing is working. When I click to report a problem it crashes. When I try to click support, it crashes. I don‚Äôt know how to keep it working. I have a lot of personally created memes and other conversations saved in here and it is all locked up.

title: Audio calling and voice message
text: First of all, When I use the telegram in sending voice message and talking in audio and video calling in telegram, quality of the voice is very bad which are noisy and no noise cancellation if I use headsets and headphones which are connected via Bluetooth devices. Second thing, there is a bug in video calls also, which is people can't see each other  If you can improve this bugs, that would great for all users.

title: Excellent app!
text: I downloaded the Telegram app after the nazi secret police of Apple and Google became the thought police of our country when they collided to pull down Parler. Telegram is easy to use, effective and helps keep me Informed (which it‚Äôs easy to see the political left in these companies IS NOT). Telegram will serve you well until the bedwetters of Apple decide they know what‚Äôs best. No matter though folks, you cannot contain us. Get Telegram you‚Äôll enjoy it.

title: Build on what you have.
text: The app is great in terms of a free speech center. Hats off to you all for standing strong. But considering how people are using the service now, you really should make it more like Twitter with a combined stream of everyone we follow. At times I‚Äôll go a day without checking and when I finally do it‚Äôs so tedious to go through all the ‚Äúmessages‚Äù. So I just skip to the bottom. Messages should be a separate tab, with the primary being a feed of all accounts.

title: JOB SEEKERS WATCH OUT FOR THIS SCAM!!!
text:
Ok in terms of the actual use of this app I have no issues. It does its job and all that. 

I‚Äôm writing however to warn people about a current trend I‚Äôve run into a couple times. 

I‚Äôm looking for work, as many of us are, and have been contacted by individuals promising interviews for work that seems far too good to be true. Flexible hours, extremely high pay, and the entire interview process is via Telegram. 

They promise to send equipment or some other type of ‚Äúcompany provided‚Äù office supplies or training materials. It‚Äôs a long run around involving no phone calls or video calls. In the end they want to send you checks for these supplies and it is all an attempt to move money through your accounts and get your financial information. 

I‚Äôll just say, if you‚Äôre looking for work and never actually speak to the individual or notice online the job isn‚Äôt posted etc. stay away. 

Best of luck!

title: App does not open after update
text:
Hello
After updating,  the app does not open on my iPhone 5 iOS 10.3.4 !
I deleted the app and install again and reset the phone but does not help . It was ok before update . I have it on my desktop but not on my phone now , 
What should I do ?!!  Help plz
Now I do install the last version 5 of the app and it works! So this version is not compatible with iPhone 5 iOS 10.3.4 !!! Whyyyy?????

title: CarPlay feature dropped
text: I‚Äôve been using Telegram with my husband as our messaging platform for a while and really like its clean and simple interface. We tried a different service for a month and decided to go back to Telegram because it was a recognized app on CarPlay. However, a week after we went back, the latest update to the app no longer had CarPlay support so we‚Äôre back to using SMS or WhatsApp to communicate on the go in the car. It‚Äôs unfortunate because Telegram is our preferred platform. Will update stars depending on this month‚Äôs update. Please bring back CarPlay!

title: I love telegram, BUT
text:
I have one chat with very important person for me I had lots of memories/photos with. I know it sounds weird but it was so important for me to keep our messages as memories about that person, that he existed in my life. Now I found out that he deleted the whole chat with me and I also don‚Äôt have these messages too (it works without my consent, which is so sad and bad!!!). I feel empty right now. 

Please, leave the function which allows to delete the chat only for ONE person (not for both), but consider removing ‚Äúdelete the chat for me and ...‚Äù. This is so unfair. Thank you.
